RTCRtpSenderTransform.summary:
The transform property of the object is used to insert a transform stream () running in a worker thread into the sender pipeline.
This allows stream transforms to be applied to encoded video and audio frames after they are output by a codec, and before they are sent.

remarks.para:
The transform that is to be added is defined using an and its associated .
If the transform is set synchronously immediately after creating the RTCRtpSender it will receive the first full frame generated by the sender's encoder.

RTCRtpSenderTransform.value: A <!-- or {{domxref("SFrameTransform")}} -->, or null if the sender has no associated transform stream.
